hipparcos.tools
Class Star

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--hipparcos.tools.Star
Direct Known Subclasses:
Star2D
public class Star
extends java.lang.Object

A class to represent one entry in the hipparcos catalog not all fields are put in here just the ones used elsewhere could easily add them all but then chewing up memory
